title: Transfer Update?
body:
Hi,
So I moved to Poland from NA, and Ive been waiting for transfers to come back up. Its been around 5-6 weeks, and I realize that it will take time but I was hoping that we could get an update on when you think transfers will be back? I haven't spent any more money on Riot Points due to the currency difference and such which is really unfortunate given I seriously wanted the new Jinx skin. Would a riot member give us an update on when the transfers could come back up?{{summoner:12}}  {{summoner:-1}} {{summoner:3}}

replies.body: It does look like HollyMonster was able to give another update in the [**Transfer Service Update**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) thread recently! So far it's looking like late Jan/early Feb and there should be some sort of discounted rate for them.
Thank you a lot, I have been waiting patiently for something, I figured I could eventually ask. Thank you guys!

If you were trying to get a skin during a sale but were unable to due to certain circumstances, you could try and reach out through a support ticket when you have the RP available and see if they could still get you that skin you wanted for the discounted price. Their most recent update stated that it probably won't be here until late January to early February, and that it would have a discounted price for a while when it does become available.
